metadata.title: Gilani mourns death of Tanveer ul Hassan Gilani

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 31 (APP): Chairman Senate Syed Yousuf Raza Gilani Thursday expressed heartfelt condolences and profound grief over the passing of former Federal Minister Syed Tanveer ul Hassan Gilani. The late Syed Tanveer ul Hassan Gilani was a close relative of Chairman Senate Syed Yousuf Raza Gilani. In his condolence message, he said that Syed Tanveer ul Hassan Gilani was a man of integrity, principles, and a warm-hearted nature. He dedicated his entire life to public service with honesty, uprightness, and a strong sense of responsibility. His political and social contributions will always be remembered. He said that the demise of Syed Tanveer ul Hassan Gilani is a deeply personal loss for him. "He was not only a close family member but also a like-minded, sincere, and loyal companion. His absence will be profoundly felt," he added. The Chairman Senate prayed that Almighty Allah may elevate the departed soul to the highest ranks in His mercy and grant the bereaved family, relatives, and friends the strength and patience to bear this immense loss.
